简介

入门

  • 继承自from twisted.internet.protocol import Protocol `In 1: from twisted.internet.protocol import Protocol

    In 2: Protocol. Protocol.connected Protocol.dataReceived Protocol.transport Protocol.connectionLost Protocol.logPrefix
    Protocol.connectionMade Protocol.makeConnection` 重写protocol类下的方法

Endpoints

  • 文档中说的是Getting Connected with Endpointsendpoints 可见这个是管链接的.
  • 用于绑定端口,

  • In [3]: import twisted.internet.endpoints as endpoints In [4]: endpoints. endpoints.ClientFactory endpoints.FilePath endpoints.IStreamClientEndpointStringParser endpoints.IStreamServerEndpointStringParser endpoints.Protocol endpoints.SSL4ClientEndpoint endpoints.SSL4ServerEndpoint endpoints.TCP4ClientEndpoint endpoints.TCP4ServerEndpoint endpoints.UNIXClientEndpoint endpoints.UNIXServerEndpoint endpoints.clientFromString endpoints.defer endpoints.directlyProvides endpoints.error endpoints.getPlugins endpoints.implements endpoints.interfaces endpoints.quoteStringArgument endpoints.serverFromString endpoints.warnings

Factory is a factory which produces protocols

reactor->反应堆 event loop
